exceptional gym experience 7 stars _exclamation_ i recently joined california gym platinum, and it been nothing short of amazing _exclamation_ the facility is top tier, with a wide range of high quality equipment, making it ideal for achieving any fitness goal. while you may not find every machine that available at some other gyms, the overall experience more than makes up for it. the service is excellent, with friendly and professional staff always ready to help. a standout feature is the luxurious spa and jacuzzi area, where you can unwind after a workout. the gym provides towels, robes, and an unlimited supply of bottled water, ensuring your comfort at all times. the swimming pool is fantastic, and the cleanliness and hygiene throughout the gym are impeccable. it a premium space, which is reflected in the price it the higher side, so it may not suit everyone. however, if you re looking for a top notch gym experience, california gym platinum is the place to be. from the excellent trainers and dynamic classes to the relaxing spa area, this gym has it all. highly recommended for those who value quality and are willing to invest in their fitness journey. overall, it a perfect 7 star experience _exclamation_
belle salle sport

expérience honteuse cette salle sport _exclamation_ lorsque simplement demandé contact responsable achats, a répondu façon agressive aller siège, comme si marché poissons devoir deviner disponible. mouna, soi disant responsable, permise crier lieu répondre professionnalisme. comment pouvez espérer attirer nouveaux clients quand personnel manque point formation, information savoir vivre _question_ commencez former équipes désignez responsables compétents salles, ça évitera genre comportement inacceptable.
